programme.desc: UEFA Conference League 2024-25. League Phase, 2η Αγωνιστική. Η 3η τη τάξει διασυλλογική διοργάνωση στην Ευρώπη διεξάγεται με νέο φορμάτ και 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων. Ο τελικός θα γίνει στο Βρότσλαβ της Πολωνίας. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Ξαρλής.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Μπράγκα - Μπόντο Γκλιμτ
programme.desc: UEFA Europa League 2024-25. League Phase, 3η Αγωνιστική. Ένα φορμάτ με 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων είναι η βασική καινοτομία της φετινής, 16ης διοργάνωσης, που θα ολοκληρωθεί στις 21 Μαΐου 2025 στο Μπιλμπάο. Περιγραφή: Κώστας Γιαλιτάκης.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Άιντραχτ Φρανκφούρτης - Ρίγα
programme.desc: UEFA Europa League 2024-25. League Phase, 3η Αγωνιστική. Ένα φορμάτ με 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων είναι η βασική καινοτομία της φετινής, 16ης διοργάνωσης, που θα ολοκληρωθεί στις 21 Μαΐου 2025 στο Μπιλμπάο. Περιγραφή: Άλκης Τσαβδαράς.

programme.title: UEL & UECL Μαγκαζίνο 2024-25
programme.desc: Εβδομαδιαίο μαγκαζίνο με φάσεις και γκολ από τις κορυφαίες διασυλλογικές διοργανώσεις της UEFA.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Παρί Σεν Ζερμέν - PSV Αϊντχόφεν
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League 2024-25. League Phase, 3η Αγωνιστική. Στην 33η σεζόν του UEFA Champions League, καθεμιά από τις 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων δίνει 8 αναμετρήσεις εναντίον διαφορετικών αντιπάλων. Ο τελικός θα φιλοξενηθεί στην Allianz Arena του Μονάχου. Περιγραφή: Πάνος Μάλαμας.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Ρεάλ Μαδρίτης - Ντόρτμουντ
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League 2024-25. League Phase, 3η Αγωνιστική. Στην 33η σεζόν του UEFA Champions League, καθεμιά από τις 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων δίνει 8 αναμετρήσεις εναντίον διαφορετικών αντιπάλων. Ο τελικός θα φιλοξενηθεί στην Allianz Arena του Μονάχου. Περιγραφή: Σωτήρης Κωσταβάρας.

programme.title: Game R1
programme.desc: Οι οικοδεσπότες του Game R1 Παύλος Παπαπαύλου και Κορίνα Ντιλενιάν 'συνοδεύουν' το gaming κοινό σε παρουσιάσεις παιχνιδιών και προϊόντων hardware, ενώ αποκαλύπτουν τα τελευταία νέα από τον χώρο των videogames, των eSports και των μεγαλύτερων events σε Ελλάδα και εξωτερικό.

programme.title: Gala: Χρυσή Μπάλα 2024
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε ζωντανά και αποκλειστικά την τελετή απονομής της 'Χρυσής Μπάλας', όπου θα αναδειχθούν οι κορυφαίοι της περασμένης σεζόν στον κόσμο του ποδοσφαίρου.

programme.title: PreGame Show
programme.desc: Το Pre Game Show μάς βάζει στον αγωνιστικό χώρο, πλάι στους πρωταγωνιστές και μας αποκαλύπτει καρέ-καρέ τα σχέδια των προπονητών λίγο πριν από τη μάχη των ομάδων τους.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Βόλος ΝΠΣ - Παναθηναϊκός
programme.desc: 10η αγωνιστική. Η νίκη στο Αγρίνιο τόνωσε την αυτοπεποίθηση του Βόλου, που φιλοξενεί τον Παναθηναϊκό. Οι «πράσινοι» θέλουν το τρίποντο για να πλησιάσουν την κορυφή.

programme.title: Sportshow
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή SPORTSHOW σας προσφέρει μια διαφορετική οπτική γωνία με κύριο άξονα την αγωνιστική δράση της εβδομάδας. Η εκπομπή περιλαμβάνει θέματα από όλα τα αθλητικά γεγονότα που έχουν θέση στο τηλεοπτικό πρόγραμμα της COSMOTE TV.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: ΠΑΣ Λαμία - ΠΑΟΚ
programme.desc: 10η αγωνιστική. Πριν από το ταξίδι στο Ολντ Τράφορντ, ο ΠΑΟΚ αντιμετωπίζει εκτός έδρας τη Λαμία, με τις δύο ομάδες να έχουν άμεση ανάγκη τη νίκη.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Γιουβέντους - Πάρμα
programme.desc: Serie A 2024-25. 10η αγωνιστική. Η 123η σεζόν της 1ης κατηγορίας του ιταλικού ποδοσφαίρου ολοκληρώνεται στις 25 Μαΐου 2025 και περιλαμβάνει 20 ομάδες. Η Ίντερ είναι η κάτοχος του τίτλου. Περιγραφή: Γιώργος Θαναηλάκης.

programme.title: A Carol for Two
programme.desc: New to New York, talented singer Violette takes a job as a singing waitress. Things get complicated when her duet partner sets her up with a friend but starts developing feelings himself.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A snowbound stranger (Warren Christie) brightens the holidays for a retired police officer (Henry Winkler) and his niece (Brooke Burns).

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: A Carol for Two
programme.desc: New to New York, talented singer Violette takes a job as a singing waitress. Things get complicated when her duet partner sets her up with a friend but starts developing feelings himself.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: The 5-Year Christmas Party
programme.desc: Told over the course of five years, two recent college grads find themselves drawn together year after year while working for a catering company that specializes in holiday parties.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

programme.title: A Not So Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A tabloid journalist tries to land an interview with a reclusive count during the holidays. In response, the royal family asks a groundskeeper to pose as the count since the real one fled years ago.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: A doctor encounters a man from her past who brings with him a revelation that could change her life forever.

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
programme.desc: When a New England Christmas decorating competition searches for the town with the most Christmas spirit, the mayors of East and West Riverton go all out to get their towns to the top of the holiday heap.

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic's (Kristin Davis) untimely death leads to her recruitment as a Christmas angel. Her first task is to help a struggling singer (Eric McCormack) use his music to heal old wounds.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: Sydney decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. When she meets Mac, he tries to make her Christmas wishes come true by helping her open herself up to life, love, and believing in the spirit of Christmas again.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Carly heads to a quaint town to lead the church choir during Christmastime. As she gets to know an Army veteran and the townspeople, she stumbles across clues that suggest she may have been brought there for a life-changing reason.

programme.title: USS Christmas
programme.desc: Maddie, a reporter for a Norfolk newspaper, embarks on a Tiger Cruise during Christmastime where she meets a handsome naval officer and stumbles upon a mystery in the ship's archive room.

programme.title: Sugar Plum Twist
programme.desc: After failing to get the coveted role of the Sugar Plum Fairy in "The Nutcracker," an aspiring ballerina joins forces with a retiree from the New York City Ballet to create her own dance spectacular -- with a Latin twist.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: The Dream Team
programme.desc: The story behind the historic Olympic gold medal run of the 1992 USA Men's Basketball team.

programme.title: Košarka - Slovenačka liga (M): Helios - Ilirija
programme.desc: Olimpija je favorit u Sloveniji, ali plasmani njihove reprezentacije pokazuju da imaju veoma široku bazu igrača. Možda budemo svedoci nekog iznenađenja? (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Slovenačka 1. liga: Domžale - Primorje
programme.desc: Prethodnih sezona gledali smo veoma zanimljiva prvenstva u Sloveniji i dobijali iznenađujuće ishode. Da li će tako biti i ove sezone? (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Austrijska liga: Salzburg - Grazer
programme.desc: Salcburg je ponovo favorit za titulu, ali LASK, Rapid i ostali se neće predati bez borbe. Svakako ćemo imati i neko iznenađenje kao Volfsberger prethodnih godina. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Farense - Benfica
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika. (LIVE).
